code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=_ref=>{let{onLogin}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post("/login",{username,password});onLogin(res.data.token,res.data.is_admin);}catch(error){alert("Login failed!");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"})]});};export default Login;
